import {Form,Button,Container, Row, Col, Alert, ListGroup ,Card} from 'react-bootstrap' import {Helmet} from 'react-helmet' import {useDispatch,useSelector} from 'react-redux'; import {Redirect} from 'react-router-dom' import React, { useState } from "react"; import ReactQuill from 'react-quill'; import 'react-quill/dist/quill.snow.css'; import Footer from './Footer'; export default function CreatePost() { const {user}=useSelector(state=>state); const [image,setImage]=useState('Insert Image'); const filechange=e=>{ console.log(e.target.files[0].name); setImage(e.target.files[0].name); } const [value, setValue] = useState(''); const [state,setState] =useState({ title:'' }) const [slug,setSlug]=useState('') const [slugbutton,setslugbutton] = useState(false); const slugupdate=(e)=>{ setslugbutton(true); setSlug(e.target.value); } const onchange=(e)=>{ setState({ ...state, [e.target.name]:e.target.value }); const createslug=e.target.value.trim().split(' ').join('-'); setSlug(createslug); } return ( <> {user ? null : } Create Post CREATE NEW POST
Title


Body
Post URL {slugbutton }


) }
